[http://www.vmware.com/products/ace/ VMware ACE] ('''a'''ssured '''c'''omputing '''e'''nvironment)<ref>http://www.vmworld.com/docs/DOC-1773</ref> is a software solution integrated in VMware Workstation that enables anyone to deploy and manage secure, platform-independent virtual machines that end users can use on their work PC, personal computer, or even a portable USB media device (in the way of a [[portable application]]).
[http://www.vmware.com/products/ace/ VMware ACE] ('''a'''ssured '''c'''omputing '''e'''nvironment)<ref>http://www.vmworld.com/docs/DOC-1773</ref> is a software solution integrated in VMware Workstation that enables anyone to deploy and manage secure, platform-independent virtual machines that end users can use on their work PC, personal computer, or even a portable USB media device (in the way of a [[portable application]]).
VMware ACE enables safe access to enterprise resources from assured computing environments. These isolated PC environments run on top of existing PCs.
VMware ACE enables safe access to enterprise resources from assured computing environments. These isolated PC environments run on top of existing PCs.
â
With virtual rights management, built-in copy protection controls, and automatic encryption, VMware ACE helps prevent theft, tampering, and unauthorized copying of applications, data, system settings, and files. Administrators can protect data and ensure compliance with IT policies, including software life-cycle management and access to data and applications.
+
With virtual rights management, built-in copy protection controls, and automatic encryption, VMware ACE helps prevent theft, tampering, and unauthorized copying of applications, data, system settings, and files. Administrators can protect data and ensure compliance with IT policies, including software life-cycle management and access to data and applications. In essence, VMware ACE allows the creation of [[portable application|portable]] [[Virtual Machine]]s.
